It allows you to manipulate different kinds of data about the company's projects and human resources, view company statistics related to human resources, and track all human resources processes within the company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This system is aimed at providing more effective staff utilization, storage\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Billing timesheets: AM is responsible for all financial info on the project. During a monthly financial closure AM should be ready with the billing data within the preliminary financial closure without any delays. Notifications about the deadlines are sent to AMs by Revenue Group regularly in advance at the end of every month. AM should be aware that all employees report their time in PMC correctly and all the time is in norm for all employees on the project. All billable employees with the time reporting in PMC should be same as in resource plans in UPSA. As soon as the revenue is recognized AM is responsible for its confirmation when he receives the correspondent emails from Revenue Group.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Read more about PMC: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pmcmsq.epam.com/pmc/help/PMC/pmc_online_help.htm\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PMC Online Help,\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pmcmsq.epam.com/pmc/faq/list.do?projectId=4000603600000003427\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PMC FAQ,\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pmctutorials.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PMC Tutorials\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Telescope (E3S)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Telescope\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (formerly E3S) is an enterprise application platform for EPAM internal applications.
